alignerConfig.name: Last
alignerConfig.help: Version of Last (official release) wrapped with Goby align mode.
alignerConfig.options:
ALIGNER_OPTIONS Other aligner options Provide any additional Lastag option here following the syntax expected by Lastag. false
STRING %s true
--quality-filter-parameters "${QUALITY_FILTER_PARAMETERS}"
AMBIGUITY_THRESHOLD Ambiguity threshold The maximum number of locations a read can match in the reference to not be considered ambiguous. Read is ambiguous if #hits>threshold.
true true 1 INTEGER --ambiguity-threshold %d true
QUALITY_FILTER_PARAMETERS Percent identity Quality filter parameters. Use threshold=x% to indicate that reads must have less than x% base differences when matched against the reference. Defaults to threshold=0.05, which indicates 5% error at most.
true true threshold=0.05 STRING --quality-filter-parameters %s true
